source.0a86903c:
df['weekday']=df.date.apply(lambda x:days.get(x.weekday()))

source.7c29b7c2:
fig_map = go.Figure(data=[
    go.Scattergeo(lat=df['lat'],
             lon=df['lon'],
             mode='markers',
             hoverinfo='text',
             marker=dict(color="darkred", size=5, opacity=0.9))
])
fig_map.update_geos(
    landcolor='white',
    showocean=True,
    oceancolor='white',
    lakecolor='blue',
)
fig_map.update_layout(
    width=800,
    height=400,
    template="plotly_white",
    margin=dict(r=0, t=0, b=0, l=0),
    annotations=[
        dict(
            text="",
            showarrow=False,
            xref="paper",
            yref="paper",
            x=0,
            y=0)
    ])

fig_map.show()
